title: Quinn is right-clicking me non-stop for 5 seconds as renekton
body:
she takes 0 damage from minons

and it's still allowed in 2017 after 7 years for no reasons
creeps are so usefull

replies.body: oh no, renek getting bullied?? how the tables have turned lol

> oh no, renek getting bullied?? how the tables have turned lol

And this is the LANE BULLY.

Anyone who isn't a lane bully is outright not played or is crying in the corner vs quinn.

> [{quoted}](name=xelaker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I0h7ckAu,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-17T21:42:55.626+0000)
>
> oh no, renek getting bullied?? how the tables have turned lol

Some people are happy today.

What do you mean? They're obviously useful, they'll keep you stuck in there if you decide to engage :^)

That being said, as a Quinn top player, I have many times lost trades with the opponent doing nothing.
You are the reason we can't have nice things.
I play her bruiser, not lethality.
You are still the reason we can't have nice things.
unlucky
enlight me about luck and minion's aggro being shit unless you're melee
well they didn't focus Quinn so you were unlucky

you're trolling or you don't know that creeps are supposed to focus enemies who attack allies?

the problem with ranged champions is that they can be outside of the range of aggro, and sometimes it doesn't even matter because creeps are slowed as fuck and deal no damage unless she stays for 10 seconds
hmmm.. unlucky

Maybe you should have backed off a bit so that she'd have to be in the aggro range to attack you?

Minion aggro has always worked properly for me in my games.  You'll even occasionally see Cait draw minion aggro, and she's got much longer range than Quinn.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I0h7ckAu,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-02-17T20:48:15.285+0000)

> 
> Minion aggro has always worked properly for me in my games.  You'll even occasionally see Cait draw minion aggro, and she's got much longer range than Quinn.

Yep. Never experienced minion aggro not working. OP: proof or Nothing.
Oh renekton bar, how far you have fallen...
sounds like every standard melee vs range matchup.

Quinn is SOOOOOO easy to beat toplane. This is definitely a learn to play issue, especially if you're playing Renekton....

In before some bronze player flames me for being a Quinn fanboy; I don't even own the champion.

which is why she has 57% win rate against renek

xd

thanks for teaching me the game

oh so winrate only matters when its for champions _you_ don't like to play against?

especially when jhin has eleven times the pick rate of quinn top

pick a side

when did i say jhin wasn't op?
stop posting in my thread dude ty, 

psa: 57% is more relevant than 52%

Maybe you didnt, but it's hard to notice beneath all your posts defending how 'healthy' and 'fair' he is while shifting the entirety of the blame to lethality.

psa: You have zero clue how numbers work if you think 57% win rate with 5% pickrate is somehow better than 52% win rate with a 55% pickrate

it's something more relevant in a match up than 52%, that doesn't mean 52% isn't relevant but 57% is way more relevant

second, learn to fucking read because healthy or fair doesn't mean the champ isn't op
just get out of my thread, i can black list you but i wish there was an option to not let some players post in my thread
if you want to ban people from commenting on your threads so that only your opinion matters then start a blog and disable comments
echo chamber at its finest ' i only want people who agree with me' lol
But winrates don't matter! Remember?

Smh 

I'll spam Renekton in top lane over the next couple days, and once I get a match with Quinn, I'll link the match info of me destroying her. Stay tuned
And that's exactly what almost every melee says about Renekton.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I0h7ckAu,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-02-18T00:58:46.035+0000)
>
> And that's exactly what almost every melee says about Renekton.

This tbh.

I feel literally no sympathy for the whiny melee lane bully (often juggernaut, though Renekton in particular isn't one) players who shit their pants every time they lane against someone like Quinn and then post a girly post on the boards about it. "Dude, why is this ranged champion beating me in lane with minimal to no counterplay? That's supposed to be what _I_ do!"

Quinn is much too strong right now and needs nerfs, but I'd frankly prefer her be meta than some fat fuck like Darius tbh fam.

> **fat fuck** like Darius

dude, Darius is in great shape and he is sexually straight just like garen.

urs truly.

a jealous fat man.
 and ...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
relevency for the thread?
nobody likes renekton and are happy to see his ass kicked in laning

Isn't Renekton one of the few champions who actually counters Quinn? 
He has double gap-closers.
Out-bully the bully.

He is one of the ones who can manage against her.

But no melee has a free win against Quinn.

I still have to work at it as Irelia if the Quinn has some idea of what they are doing.

he can't do shit against her

she has 57% win rate against renekton

I'm not really going to argue with someone who is a higher rank then me. 

But I think it's a situation of "Win-rate isn't everything" 

Neither have the highest play-rates in general, so how big even is the stat pool? 

Quinn generally has a better time closing the game then Renekton does, so whilst she has a higher win-rate I'm not sure that means you don't have a chance of at least winning lane against her.
I guess I kinda stand corrected.

{{champion:83}}  Works well against her but the key is to play safe, she has pitfall weaknesses and you need to time it right. for starters few hits with your Q will summon Ghouls and you're E tagging her with them will fuck her up. No shame in getting hit by her E as you can wall her after she hits you with it, then E her with   Ghouls and game over bitch. however you will have a far better advantage when you reach lv 6 and destroy her with your ult. Build {{item:3047}} early to reduced her poke damage.

But the key is to play fucking safe as she is a lane bully and lane bullies hate when someone plays safe and BAM!!!!!!! they got rekt'd thinking they won the lane but really lose the game, so use their aggression against them because they think they are unstoppable in spite of being OP.
OP is not complaining about Riven, he's talking about minions not dealing shit for damage when you let them agro on you.

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I0h7ckAu,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-02-17T22:14:44.647+0000)

talking about Quinn.

Welcome to Gameplay and balance where all the bronzies come to give "advice", completely shit on the thread they clearly don't understand and downvote the ~~Diamond~~ Master player.

Holy fuck this section is cancer.

people downvote rubick because he is a bandwagoning circlejerker with a terrible attitude , complete and utter demonstrable bias , very hypocritical , wants to block anybody who disagrees from commenting on his threads . nobody gives a flying fuck about his rank he is an asshole .
Unfortunately not as bad as some people I've seen around the boards . . .

yeah i don't know how much time i'll remain here

backtalking me is something that i can understand
replying to the thread without having any clue what the thread is about is a freaking idiot behavior

Well minion damage itself is perfectly fine: 3 caster minions is 1 champion auto attack early game and it should stay that way: It gives a good amount of opportunities to trade.

But melee champions are super tanky early game and can actually take one or two more auto attacks than ranged champions per trade so going ham when they auto rather than walking away in an attempt to bait them into your minion wave is usually the better choice
How do you lose to Quinn as Renekton? Lol
You're still alive after 5 seconds? Damn you're tanky

Good new if that if you attack her all the winions will attack you, right? Minions in melee versus range feel terrible: they body block making it harder to cs, they attack you if you somehow get on top of the ranged character, they do not help you if the ranged champ attacks you, and they force you into predictable patterns for skill shots when trying to cs. I am just happy that people in my elo do not play Quinn.
